description: The Soil Water Index (SWI) Static Layer collection provides static masks and ancillary files that aid in the analysis of the daily SWI, 10-daily SWI or SWI Time Series products. These include (i) a DGG file to find Discrete Global Grid cell corresponding to a given location, (ii) a tropical Forest Mask (FM), (iii) a Topographic Complexity (TC) mask, a (iv) Wetland Fraction (WF) mask and (iv) Correlation Information (CI) that shows the correlation with Global Land Data Assimilation (GLDAS) models.
title: Soil Water Index: Static layers
